CollaborationGroupRecord.name: CollaborationGroupRecord
CollaborationGroupRecord.description: Represents the records associated with Chatter groups.

CollaborationGroupId.description: Required. ID of the Chatter group.

NetworkId.description: Optional. The ID of the Experience Cloud site that the group belongs to. Available from API version 34.0.

RecordId.description: Required. The ID of the record associated with the Chatter group.
